text: Abbi and Ilana ’ s wild NYC adventures are coming to an end : Broad City ‘ s upcoming fifth season will be its last, Comedy Central announced on Thursday. Broad City stars Abbi Jacobson and Ilana Glazer — who also co - created the series — as two perpetually stoned best friends hustling their way through their 20s in New York City. The half - hour comedy debuted on Comedy Central back in 2014, after beginning life as a web series, winning acclaim along with a loyal audience. Season 5, first announced in 2016, will air early next year. Jacobson and Glazer ’ s relationship with Comedy Central will continue beyond Broad City, though : The two have signed a comprehensive first - look development deal with the network, and already have three new series in development. “
